content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
For PlayStation®3 and PlayStation®Vita.

Invasion
Defend the towns of Britain from an invasion of naughty Vikings in this frantic and funny arcade bash-em-up. Lead gangs of civilians into battle and toss whatever you can find at your hairy-faced foes; from road signs, to postboxes or even vehicles – and stay fast on your feet to dodge deadly attacks from the cranky invaders.

Special Edition Includes
•When Vikings Attack!™ – the full bonkers battle against the Scandinavian scallywags.
•When Vikings Relax! game pack – featuring 10 multiplayer battle arenas and the single player Solo Survival Mode. Also features a host of special warrior costumes along with two costumes based on Sony cat mascots Toro and Kuro.
•When Vikings Attack!™ dynamic theme for PlayStation®3.

Striking the Vikings
•Fight alongside up to three friends on the PS3™ or PS Vita system via Cross-play.
•Thrash your friends in fast, frantic and funny multiplayer battles.
•Carry on battling wherever you are with Cross-save: start your game on PS3™ system and then continue your adventure on PS Vita, or vice versa.

Cross-Buy
•Even Vikings know a great deal when they see one. Buy When Vikings Attack!™ Special Edition for either PS3™ or PS Vita system and plunder the other version AT NO EXTRA COST.
•To play the PS Vita version you need a PlayStation®Vita memory card.

Requires the PSVita and PS3 system versions of the software (may be sold separately).PS3 Compatibility Notices:1-4 Players; 700MB minimum space required; HDTV screen resolution: 720p/1080i/1080p; Network Features; Network Players 2-4; PS Vita Cross-play; PS Vita Cross-save.PS Vita Compatibility Notices:1 Player; 650MB Minimum Space Required; Microphone; Dual Analog Sticks; Network Players 2-4; Network Features; PS3™ Cross-play; PS3™ Cross-save

This item is being licensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item.

This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation® devices associated with this Sony Entertainment Network Account. Please see software description for device compatibility.

©2012 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. Developed by Clever Beans. When Vikings Attack! is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Europe.
